channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. stocks gain modestly, attempting a rebound even as tariff war escalates
item.description: U.S. stock indices were modestly higher even as President Trump's latest round of tariffs kicked in. But nerves abounded, with China and the EU announ...

item.title: Druze militias are suspicious of Syria's new leaders -- and are ready to go to battle
item.description: The new leadership vowed to disband all militias. But the fiercely independent Druze have made no agreement, and say they're gathering fighters and ma...

item.title: If Planet Nine is out there, this telescope might actually find it
item.description: A powerful new observatory is the best hope yet for finding the elusive Planet 9, a large planet that some scientists say is hidden in our solar syste...

item.title: Lori Vallow Daybell starts a new murder trial, acting as her own attorney
item.description: Vallow Daybell is charged with conspiracy to commit first-degree murder in the death of her husband, Charles Vallow, in Arizona in 2019.

item.title: U.S. says it will start monitoring immigrants' social media for antisemitism
item.description: Effective immediately, the government says it will begin screening immigrant social media for activity that officals think indicates support for antis...

item.title: King speaks in Italian during Rome parliament speech
item.description: The King and Queen will later attend a state dinner on the third day of their state visit to Italy.

item.title: Virginia shooting kills 3 and wounds 3 others; suspects in custody
item.description: Four people were charged in connection with a shooting that killed three people and wounded three others in Virginia, authorities said.

item.title: China retaliates against Trump's 'trade tyranny' with 84% tariffs
item.description: Manufacturers and exporters are scrambling after 104% tariff on China-made goods comes into effect.

item.title: Trump tariffs spark US government debt sell-off
item.description: The cost of borrowing for the US government rose as confidence in the economy waned

item.title: Video shows Idaho police shooting knife-wielding teen with autism
item.description: Victor Perez remained hospitalized in critical condition Tuesday after having nine bullets removed from his body and having his leg amputated, his aun...

item.title: Israeli strike on Gaza residential building kills 29, medics say
item.description: The Israeli military says it had struck a "senior Hamas terrorist" in the Shejaiya neighbourhood of Gaza City.

item.title: Trump administration halts $1 billion in federal funding for Cornell, $790 million for Northwestern
Germany's Merz seals government deal bringing end to months of stalemate
item.description: The conservatives under Friedrich Merz reach a coalition agreement with the Social Democrats to govern Europe's biggest economy.

item.title: China hikes tariffs on U.S. goods to 84%, as EU also hits back
item.description: China said it will hike its levies on U.S. imports to 84% after President Trump hit Chinese goods with 104% tariff

item.title: Co-worker: Gilgo murders suspect unnerved her by tracking her down on a cruise

item.title: Stocks gyrate as nervous investors eye intensifying trade war
item.description: The S&P 500 is approaching a bear market, with stocks down almost 20% from their mid-February peak, as trade war intensifies.

item.title: Kentucky watches for surging rivers to recede so widespread cleanup can begin

item.title: Outrage builds as video shows Idaho police shooting a knife-wielding autistic teenager
